metadata.title: CVE-2024-56546 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drivers: soc: xilinx: add the missing kfree in xlnx_add_cb_for_suspend()If we fail to allocate memory for cb_data by kmalloc, the memoryallocation for eve_data is never freed, add the missing kfree()in the error handling path.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
